name: safari-ball
effect: Used in battle : Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1.5×. This item can only be used in the great marsh or kanto safari zone.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon in the Great Marsh or Safari Zone. Success rate is 1.5×.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A special BALL that is used only in the SAFARI ZONE.
flavor_text.emerald: A special BALL that is used only in the SAFARI ZONE.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A special BALL that is used only in the SAFARI ZONE. It is finished in a camouflage pattern.
